recipesJson.name: Rusty Mango Cream
recipesJson.author: MrZigglesworth
recipesJson.description: Named after a very close friend that loved Mellow Mango from Paramount Vapor. Sometimes less is more, and with just these 2 flavors you get a nice mango with just a bit of cream. You can try adding TPA Sweetener but it's pretty good by itself. Allow 3-4 days to steep.
